title: Fix deployment blockers and launch the proposal site to production

requirements.text: Resolve the deployment domain validation failure by replacing the invalid domain string "for_my_YELLOW" with a domain that meets the platform rules (5–50 characters; only letters, numbers, and hyphens), then re-attempt production deployment.

quotes: Finalize the website and go live now

acceptanceCriteria: The configured production domain is not "for_my_YELLOW" and contains only letters, numbers, and hyphens (no underscores).
A production deployment can be initiated without any domain validation errors.

requirements.text: Investigate and fix the generic "Production deployment error: Deployment error" by identifying the failing step and correcting the underlying issue so the current Version 3 build can successfully deploy to production.

quotes: Finalize the website and go live now

acceptanceCriteria: A new production deployment completes successfully without returning "Production deployment error: Deployment error".
The deployed production site loads the proposal flow end-to-end (asking → yes → envelope → accepted) without runtime errors in the browser console.

requirements.text: Verify that all static assets referenced by the UI are present at their expected paths and load successfully in production (including the hero photo at "/assets/file_0000000085ec71fa9b0ffc17f2cf245d-1.png", the generated mascot at "/assets/generated/cute-mascot.dim_900x900.png", and the background music at "/assets/audio/romantic-background.mp3"). Fix any missing/incorrect paths or missing files.

quotes: Finalize the website and go live now

acceptanceCriteria: In production, the hero photo renders (no broken image icon).
In production, the mascot image renders in both the asking and accepted states.
In production, after a user interaction, the background music can play successfully (no 404s for the MP3 in the network panel).

constraints: Respect the single-actor backend architecture; keep all Motoko logic in backend/main.mo.
Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui or any other paths listed as immutable in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: Adding new proposal interactions or additional pages beyond what already exists.
Introducing external databases, third-party auth providers, or non-Internet-Identity authentication.
